text: 33:13 Esekiel 3:20; 18:24Kɨ gumazir aghuibav gɨa ghaze, me deraghvɨra ikiam. Eghtɨ gumazitam nɨghnɨgh suam, an arazir aghuir an amiziba an akuraghtɨ a deravɨra ikiam, egh arazir aghuiba ategh arazir kurabar amuam, eghtɨ kɨ an arazir aghuir a fomɨrama amizibagh nɨghnɨghan kogham. Bar puvatɨ. A datɨrɨghɨn uan arazir kuraba bangɨn an aremegham.
